inclusion.criterion: Benign or indeterminate nodule less than 6 cm in size
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: T1 well differentiated papillary carcinoma less than 2 cm in size
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Total thyroid size is 7-8 cm (no more than 10 cm)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Their age is ≥18 years and ≤80 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of neck surgery or neck radiotherapy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of neck surgery and radiotherapy, which are likely to trigger exclusion criteria. Additionally, lymph node metastases are present.
